channel.title: house on Front Left by the Speaker
channel.description: Recent content in house on Front Left by the Speaker

item.title: Popsneverdrops - IWD Special
item.description: Popsneverdrops (she/her) / March 08, 2024 / International Women’s Day Special / 6-7PM Celebration of International Women’s Day with a DJ set featuring Popsneverdrops’ favorite powerful female vocals, an ode to the strength and resilience of women. Expect some shout-outs! About Popsneverdrops Popsneverdrops may not be a real DJ but if necessary, she’ll deliver. Her selection varies but she’s always keeping it soulful and uplifting, no matter if it’s soul, disco or house music.

item.title: DJ Tracksuit
item.description: February 28, 2024 / DJ Tracksuit (he/him) / 6-7PM Hour of Power - a show where I play music that I play in clubs. Usually around 128bpm. About DJ Tracksuit Find him on the dancefloor with his (self-proclaimed) great dance moves or in the booth, mixing records at listening bars and clubs all around Europe. DJ Tracksuitâ€™s sound travels through the grooves and rhythms of the African diaspora, taking you to dizzying heights of Spiritual Jazz, heavy lows of Dub, Reggae and Deep House, then twists you into a joyous state with Zouk and Disco.

item.title: HUNDI & Crisp Sandwich
item.description: HUNDI & Crisp Sandwich February 14, 2024 / 7-8PM Join us for a special mix featuring the dynamic duo of Hundi & Crisp Sandwich, going back to back in celebration of our love. Together, we bring a shared passion for rhythmic beats, often exploring unconventional genre combinations and showcasing their love for uplifting brain teasers. All with a sprinkle of emotion, sensitivity, and an undeniable energy. Today’s show pays tribute to our bubble, inviting listeners into the vibrant world we’ve created.
